pr_title: Adds API definition as an inline parameter when importing APIs in publisher REST Apis

timeline.message: Adds string swagger definition as the inline parameter for import-openapi and validate-openapi endpoints.

timeline.bodyText:
Suggested change
        
          
    

        
      
    
    
      
          
            
                              description: Inline content of the swagger file
          
          
            
                              description: Inline content of the OpenAPI definition
timeline.author: malinthaprasan
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -1310,6 +1310,9 @@ paths:
                 additionalProperties:
                   type: string
                   description: Additional attributes specified as a stringified JSON with API's schema
+                inlineAPIDefinition:
+                  type: string
+                  description: Inline content of the swagger file

timeline.bodyText:
Suggested change
        
          
    

        
      
    
    
      
          
            
                              description: Inline content of the swagger file
          
          
            
                              description: Inline content of the OpenAPI definition
timeline.author: malinthaprasan
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -1530,6 +1533,9 @@ paths:
                   type: string
                   description: OpenAPI definition as a file
                   format: binary
+                inlineAPIDefinition:
+                  type: string
+                  description: Inline content of the swagger file
